name: Johnny Sims
description: Am caring and God fearing man and i believe in trust cos You need trust to love, but first you need to love in order to trust. To love someone is to understand each other, to laugh together, to smile with your heart and to trust one another, One important thing is to let each other Love is like a wonderful feeling of compassion and satisfaction. It should be given respect and trust; and it should receive that love back. The best proof of love is trust. True love is the greatest thing that you can experience; it can weather any storm. Loving, tr
